<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> not a <S%H7458>famine<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> a <S%H6772>thirst<s%> for <S%H4325>water,<s%> but of <S%H8085>hearing<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>
